comments:
jst.ws.tests failing in the 0830 build in the 0.7.1 maintenance stream

http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/downloads/drops/M-M20050830-200508300819/

Seng, the exceptions appear related to J2EE's virtual component stuff. Would 
you have a look please and determine what changed, either in Web Services or in 
J2EE, in the maintenance stream?

My initial reaction was that it was that intermittent problem we were seeing a
while ago.

The stack shows the error occured in J2EE code, and I have contacted Chuck
Bridgham who is investigating.

Here is the error stacktrace:

NOTE: The latest 0831 maintenance build had no errors. GO figure!
http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/downloads/drops/I-I20050831-200508310009/

I am marking as fixed, since haven't seen for a while .. if we see again, feel
free to re-open.
